G

GameAction - Enum in eventmanager
This enum represents the set of possible actions that can occur a random game event.
GameEnvironment - Class in main
GameEnvironment is the central class to the game having all game related objects as its members.
GameEnvironment() - Constructor for class main.GameEnvironment
 
GameEvent - Class in eventmanager
GameEvent is the abstract base class for all random events in the game.
GameEvent() - Constructor for class eventmanager.GameEvent
 
GameEventManager - Class in eventmanager
GameEventManager handles the possible GameEvents for every GameAction.
GameEventManager() - Constructor for class eventmanager.GameEventManager
Default Constructor initialises internal arrays.
GameSetup - Class in main
GameSetup handles setup of the game.
GameSetup(GameEnvironment, boolean) - Constructor for class main.GameSetup
GameSetup constructor.
gameStillActive() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Check if Lose/Win Condition has been met resulting in the game halting.
GameWorldGenerator - Class in main
GameWorldGenerator contains many factory functions for building key game aspects.
GameWorldGenerator() - Constructor for class main.GameWorldGenerator
 
generateWorld(GameEnvironment) - Static method in class main.GameWorldGenerator
generates planets and an event manager for the given GameEnvironment.
GenericRestorationItem - Class in items
generic ConsumableItem subclass that can increase a CrewMember's fullness or health (or both).
